subject.topic: Citizens to Preserve Overton Park v. Volpe

mods.abstract: In this interview John Ford Canale, a Southwestern alumnus, shares stories of living in the Evergreen neighborhood and in Memphis in general. He talks about his neighboors, how the neigborhood has been kept up, and freeway construction.
